text: Daan Myngheer (13 April 1993 – 28 March 2016) was a Belgian cyclist. In 2015, he was a member of the Verandas Willems cycling team and in 2016 he was a member of the Roubaix–Lille Métropole. He was born in Roeselare, Belgium. Myngheer died in a hospital in Ajaccio, France after suffering a heart attack during the Criterium International, aged 22. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1993 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:People from West Flanders
title: Daan Myngheer
